stats: Your Rip lasts for an additional 4 seconds, and your Lacerate deals an additional 5% damage
Increases the duration of Barkskin by 3 seconds and decreases the cooldown of Tiger's Fury by 3 seconds
Your Insect Swarm deals an additional 10% damage
Your Wrath and Starfire spells gain an additional 5% critical strike chance
The cost of your Lifebloom is reduced by 5%
Your Nourish heals an additional 5% for each of your heal over time effects present on the target

Your Swipe (Bear) and Lacerate abilities deal 20% additional damage and the cost of your Rip ability is reduced by 10 energy
Your Enrage ability no longer decreases your armor and instead decreases all damage taken by 12%, and the periodic damage done by your Rake ability can now be a critical strike
The healing granted by your Wild Growth spell reduces 30% less over time
Each time your Rejuvenation spell heals a target, it has a 2% chance to jump to a new target at full duration
When you gain Clearcasting from your Omen of Clarity talent, you deal 15% additional Nature and Arcane damage for 6 sec
Your critical strikes from Starfire and Wrath cause the target to languish for an additional 7% of your spell's damage over 4 sec

Increases the critical strike chance of your Nourish spell by 5%
Your Rejuvenation ability now has a chance for its healing to be critical strikes
Your Moonfire ability now has a chance for its periodic damage to be critical strikes
Increases the damage done by your Starfire and Wrath spells by 4%
The periodic damage dealt by your Rake, Rip, and Lacerate abilities has a chance to cause you to enter a Clearcasting state
Increases the duration of Savage Roar and Survival Instinct by 8 sec
Increases the bonus granted by Eclipse for Starfire and Wrath by 7%
Each time your Insect Swarm deals damage, it has a chance to make your next Starfire cast within 10 sec instant
Increases the healing done by your Swiftmend spell by 10%
